[[inst_hl_lb_po]]
==== HL.LB.PO

*Syntax:* hl.lb.po [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lb_po.svg[HL.LB.PO encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/POST_INDEX
